name: valetudo-backend
description: Self-contained control webinterface for vacuum robots

scripts.prepare_commit: npm run lint_fix && npm run ts-check && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run build_armv7 && npm run build_aarch64 && npm run build_armv7_lowmem
scripts.build_armv7: npm run pre_build && cross-env PKG_CACHE_PATH=../build_dependencies/pkg pkg --targets node22-linuxstatic-armv7 --compress Brotli --no-bytecode --public-packages "*" --options "expose-gc,max-heap-size=42" . --output ../build/armv7/valetudo
scripts.build_aarch64: npm run pre_build && cross-env PKG_CACHE_PATH=../build_dependencies/pkg pkg --targets node22-linuxstatic-arm64 --compress Brotli --no-bytecode --public-packages "*" --options "expose-gc,max-heap-size=64" . --output ../build/aarch64/valetudo
scripts.build_armv7_lowmem: npm run pre_build && cross-env PKG_CACHE_PATH=../build_dependencies/pkg pkg --targets node22-linuxstatic-armv7 --compress Brotli --no-bytecode --public-packages "*" --options "expose-gc,max-heap-size=34,optimize-for-size,lite-mode,no-regexp-tier-up" . --output ../build/armv7/valetudo-lowmem
